amendment.description: To enact the Firefighters Medical Monitoring Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2025 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 3. Record Vote Number: 417.

action.text: Amendment SA 2025 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S13481-13482; text: CR S13481) To enact the Firefighters Medical Monitoring Act.
